metadata.name: Amp
metadata.description:
[h1] REPENTOGON is required for this mod to function. [/h1] https://repentogon.com [h2]Amp, a very lost, and very confused Pikmin in the Basement. [/h2]
[h2] Mod Support: [/h2] [list] [*]Pog for Good Items [*]Ugh for Bad Items [*]Unique Co-op Ghosts [Amp has a unique ghost] [*]Fiend Folio [costumes] [*]Revelation [costumes] [*]Epiphany [costumes] [*]Community Remix [costumes] [/list]
[h3]Amp[/h3] Starts with two red hearts, slightly above average speed, and lower than normal damage. Theyâ€™ve got electrified tears that can really pack a punch against swarms of enemies, and they have so much electricity built up in them that even just being near things will electrocute them!
[h3]Tainted Amp[/h3] [i]Amp's lost soul, doomed to forever roam the basement.[/i] Starts with 3 soul hearts, as well as flight and spectral, but even lower damage, but they come with with Technology Zero as a third tear modifier!
Thumbnail art drawn by Alex [Twitter / @Jacob2boi]
